decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

20058:P01b         Location Plans
20058:P05b         Proposed Site Plan
20058:P06a         Proposed Plans
20058:P07b         Proposed Plans  
20058:P08b         Proposed Elevations
20058:P09b         Proposed Perspectives

Condition : 3 - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Access to the flat roof of the development hereby permitted shall be for maintenance or emergency purposes only, and the flat roof shall not be used as a roof garden, terrace, patio or similar amenity area.

Condition : 5 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:


  i) The application was amended during the applicaiton process. 
ii) An extended expiry was agreed with the applicant.
description: ERECTION OF A SINGLE-STOREY SIDE/REAR EXTENSION, PART TWO-STOREY SIDE/ REAR INFILL EXTENSION WITH NEW ROOF, REAR DORMERS, FRONT/ SIDE AND REAR ROOF LIGHTS, ALTERATIONS TO THE EXISTING ROOF STRUCTURE TO RAISE THE FRONT HIPPED GABLE RIDGE AND THE INTRODUCTION OF SOLAR PANELS. ERECTION OF RAISED REAR GARDEN TERRACE WITH ASSOCIATED BOUNDARY ALTERATIONS
